origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FintechCaseStudyAPI.fetch_case_studies', 'description': 'This function fetches case studies of fintech applications in a specific industry and region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry where fintech case studies are requested, e.g., banking, retail.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which fintech case studies are requested, e.g., global, Asia.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'A list of fintech case studies in the specified industry and region.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FintechCaseStudyAPI.fetch_case_studies, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'banking', 'region'是'global'.
